const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const passport_1 = require("@nestjs/passport");
const swagger_1 = require("@nestjs/swagger");
const auth_service_1 = require("../auth/auth.service");
const auth_social_login_dto_1 = require("../auth/dto/auth-social-login.dto");
const auth_ravelry_service_1 = require("./auth-ravelry.service");
const auth_ravelry_dto_1 = require("./dto/auth-ravelry.dto");
const config_1 = require("@nestjs/config");
let AuthRavelryController = class AuthRavelryController {
    constructor(authService, authRavelryService, configService) {
        this.authService = authService;
        this.authRavelryService = authRavelryService;
        this.configService = configService;
    }
    async register() {
        const authorizationUri = await this.authRavelryService.getRedirectUrl();
        return authorizationUri;
    }
    async callback(req, res) {
        const accessToken = await this.authRavelryService.getAccessToken(req);
        const ravelryUserInfo = await this.authRavelryService.getUserInfoByAccessToken(accessToken);
        console.log('ravelryUserInfoTest', ravelryUserInfo);
        const ravelryUser = await this.authRavelryService.findOrCreateRavelryUser(ravelryUserInfo, accessToken);
        console.log('ravelryUserTest', ravelryUser);
        const socialData = this.authRavelryService.genSocialData(ravelryUser);
        console.log('socialDataTest', socialData);
        const userId = await this.authService.findOrCreateUserByRavelryUserId(ravelryUser, socialData);
        const frontUrl = this.configService.get('FRONTEND_DOMAIN');
        res.redirect(`${frontUrl}/sign-in/social/${userId}`);
    }
    async test(ravelryId) {
        const ravelryUserInfo = { id: ravelryId };
        const ravelryUser = await this.authRavelryService.findOrCreateRavelryUser(ravelryUserInfo, 'ddd');
        const socialData = this.authRavelryService.genSocialData(ravelryUser);
        const userId = await this.authService.findOrCreateUserByRavelryUserId(ravelryUser, socialData);
    }
    async getRedirectUrl() {
        const authorizationUri = await this.authRavelryService.getLinkRedirectUrl();
        console.log('authorizationUri', authorizationUri);
        return authorizationUri;
    }
    async linkCallback(req, res) {
        const accessToken = await this.authRavelryService.getLinkAccessToken(req);
        const ravelryUserInfo = await this.authRavelryService.getUserInfoByAccessToken(accessToken);
        const newRavelryUser = await this.authRavelryService.saveAuthRavelryUser(ravelryUserInfo, accessToken);
        console.log('newRavelryUser', newRavelryUser);
        const frontUrl = this.configService.get('FRONTEND_DOMAIN');
        if (newRavelryUser == -1) {
            res.redirect(`${frontUrl}/sign-in/ravelry/-1`);
        }
        else {
            res.redirect(`${frontUrl}/sign-in/ravelry/${newRavelryUser.id}`);
        }
    }
    async linkRavelryToAnotherAccount(req, dto) {
        const updateResult = await this.authRavelryService.linkRavelryToAnotherAccount(req.user, dto);
        return updateResult;
    }
};
